synopsis.text: Mariko, a resilient and compassionate downtown schoolgirl with a passion for motorcycles, finds herself in a high-stakes race against the privileged son of a bike manufacturer. Eager to break free from the confines of street racing and make a name for herself in the professional racing world, Mariko and her friends embark on a thrilling journey. One fateful weekend, a mysterious rider on a blue bike challenges them to a race down the mountain, resulting in Mariko's childhood friend Keiichi being injured and hospitalized. Determined to seek justice and vengeance, Mariko challenges the enigmatic blue biker to a legitimate race on a professional track, setting the stage for a heart-pounding showdown between two formidable opponents.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
